Class MemberService

  • java.lang.Object
    • services.MemberService

  • @Path(value="/groups/{groupId}/members")
public class MemberService
extends java.lang.Object
    This service handles the membership of a user within a group.

    0.1
    Author:

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.util.ArrayList<Member> getMemberByGroupId(@PathParam(value="groupId")
                                                                                                  int groupId)
        Retrieves all the members in the group of a given groupId.
        Parameters:
        groupId - The group to get the members of.
        Returns:
        An arrayList of members in the given group.

      • inviteAMember

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{email}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response inviteAMember(@PathParam(value="email")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                                      @PathParam(value="groupId")
                                                                                                                      int groupId)
        Invites a user to become a member of a group. curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST -d {"email":"to@h.no"} http://localhost:8080/scrum/rest/groups/2/members/to@h.no
        Parameters:
        email - Email of the user
        groupId - The group which the user is invited to.
        Returns:
        Returns HTTP status 200 if successful, else HTTP status 500.
